sentence.Network_en: Very likely he'd told them he had American business interests.
sentence.Network_cn: 很可能他已经告诉他们自己拥有美国商业利益.

sentence.Network_en: He once told an interviewer that he didn't even like rock music.
sentence.Network_cn: 他曾告诉一位采访者，他甚至都不喜欢摇滚乐。

sentence.Network_en: He told some lies and sometimes just embroidered the truth.
sentence.Network_cn: 他说了些谎，有时只是对事实添油加醋了一番。

I thought he would have told you about it ., 我认为他已告知你此事.

list.abs: you , you told me ., 你 , 你告诉我.

encyclopedia.content: TOLD（Tourism-Oriented Land Development，TOLD），即旅游导向型土地综合开发模式，是指在一片相当大规模的地区范围（从几平方公里到数百平方公里）内，以旅游开发为先导和主要功能方向，并结合房地产产品、户外运动产品、商务会展产品及其他更多业态进行规划建设的土地综合发展模式。它是通过对旅游资源的创新开发、重新开发、补充开发等方式，形成具有一种或多种主题，兼容多种旅游或非旅游活动，集中多种休闲、游憩、娱乐、商

entry.def: Told is the past tense and past participle of tell .
You can use all told to introduce or follow a summary, general statement, or total.

example.ex: All told there were 104 people on the payroll...
All told, it seems like an awful mess…
